data.title: Chiwetel Ejiofor: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Chiwetel Ejiofor: Check out the list of all Chiwetel Ejiofor movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Chiwetel Ejiofor news on Times of India.
data.text:
The Old Guard 2' Cast Update: Original stars return, new faces join, and one departure

etimes.in / Jul 19, 2024, 15:31 (IST)

Fans of the hit Netflix movie 'The Old Guard' are buzzing with excitement as updates on the much-anticipated sequel, 'The Old Guard 2,' surface. Charlize Theron, along with seven original cast members, is set to return. New faces are joining the lineup, promising fresh twists. Though delays have occurred, Theron hints that the release is coming soon.

Renee Zellweger and Hugh Grant's intimate pics on sets of next 'Bridget Jones' film LEAKED- Pics Inside

etimes.in / Jul 09, 2024, 07:34 (IST)

The fourth Bridget Jones movie sees Hugh Grant's Daniel Cleaver reuniting with Renee Zellweger's Bridget, sparking rumors of a reignited romance. Colin Firth's character is written out, making room for new love interests. The next instalment of the Bridget Jones series is scheduled to release in theatres next Valentine's Day.

Venom 3: The exciting new chapter in Spider-Man Universe

May 28, 2024, 17:09 (IST)

Adding to the excitement, the movie might feature additional symbiotes like Toxin, who in the comics is the offspring of Carnage. Toxin's arrival could pose a significant threat, potentially leading to the formation of a group of vigilantes known as The Jury. Led by Chiwetel Ejiofor's character, The Jury aims to eradicate all symbiotes, setting the stage for intense conflict and action

'Mufasa: The Lion King': Barry Jenkins shares first look of live-action Lion King prequel

etimes.in / Apr 04, 2024, 06:17 (IST)

Barry Jenkins' 'Mufasa: The Lion King' prequel delves into Mufasa's origins with Scar, featuring an ensemble cast. The film's exclusive preview at D23 Expo 2022 captivated attendees. Jenkins' third directorial venture premieres on December 20.

Scarlett Johansson to make directorial debut with 'Eleanor the Great'; casts Marvel actors

Feb 24, 2024, 16:08 (IST)

Scarlett Johansson directs 'Eleanor the Great' with June Squibb as Eleanor Morgenstein, a 90-year-old woman in New York City. Chiwetel Ejiofor, Jessica Hecht, and Erin Kellyman also star. The film, written by Tory Kamen, is set for release in theaters.

Did you know that Irrfan Khan chose Piku over Matt Damon’s The Martian?

etimes.in / Jan 08, 2024, 11:00 (IST)

Irrfan Khan, a renowned Indian actor, chose to prioritize Shoojit Sircar's film "Piku" over Ridley Scott's "The Martian," where he was initially cast as Vincent Kapoor. Piku's scheduling conflicted, and Irrfan, valuing the evolving phase of Indian cinema, opted for it, stating, "I'll explore Mars later; let me see Earth first."

Chiwetel Ejiofor admits his upcoming series 'does subtly touch on migrants'

IANS / Apr 23, 2022, 12:42 (IST)

British actor Chiwetel Ejiofor, who enthralled the audience with his performance in 'Twelve Years A Slave', is all set to reprise the role that glam rock icon David Bowie once played in 'The Man Who Fell to Earth'.

Bengali dubbed version of John Cusack starrer Hollywood movie 2012 to air this weekend

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Sep 11, 2020, 11:59 (IST)

The movie, which grossed well on the box office across the globe, stars John Cusack, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Amanda Peet, Oliver Plat, Thandie Newton, Danny Glover, Woody Harrelson. The movies telling the end of the world tale are mostly entertaining and 2012 isn’t an exception.

‘Spider-Man’ Director Sam Rami roped in to direct Benedict Cumberbatch in Marvel’s 'Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness'

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Apr 15, 2020, 19:08 (IST)

Director Sam Raimi, who helped launch the superhero genre with 2002s 'Spider-Man', has been roped in to direct 'Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness' it has been confirmed.

Aishwarya Rai Bachchan channels her inner diva at the trailer launch of Angelina Jolie starrer 'Maleficent: Mistress of Evil'

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Oct 14, 2019, 14:14 (IST)

Angelina Jolie is all set to reprise her popular ominous character of Maleficent in the Joachim Rønning sequel 'Maleficent: Mistress of Evil'. The film has been garnering a lot of buzz in the domestic circuit as well since the makers of the film brought Indian beauty Aishwarya Rai Bachchan on-board to lend her voice to the Hindi version.

Watch Video: Angelina Jolie gets ready for the grand world premiere of 'Maleficent: Mistress of Evil'

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Oct 03, 2019, 16:24 (IST)

The grand world premiere of Angelina Jolie's film 'Maleficent: Mistress of Evil' which happened a few days back saw the diva walk the red carpet with her kids.

Aishwarya Rai Bachchan to lend her voice to Angelina Jolie's character in 'Maleficent: Mistress Of Evil'

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Oct 01, 2019, 13:17 (IST)

The makers of Angelina Jolie starrer 'Maleficent: Mistress Of Evil' are leaving no stone unturned as the release date of the film nears. They have roped in India's eternal beauty Aishwarya Rai Bachchan to lend her mesmerising voice to Jolie's character in the Hindi version of the film.

'Maleficent: Mistress of Evil' new trailer: Angelina Jolie and Elle Fanning's fairytale saga will get you on the edge of your seats

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Sep 25, 2019, 11:41 (IST)

Angelina Jolie and Elle Fanning's film 'Maleficent: Mistress of Evil' is a sequel to her 2014 film 'Maleficent' which showcased the love-story of a powerful fairy living in the magical forest of Moors and how she turns wicked due to betrayal from her loved one.

'Maleficent: Mistress of Evil': Makers reveal the true motives of the Queen in this intriguing new video

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Sep 18, 2019, 14:33 (IST)

After impressing the audience with a jaw-dropping trailer, the makers of 'Maleficent: Mistress of Evil' took to their social media handle to share a new video which gives us an insight of the Queen true motives.

'Maleficent: Mistress of Evil': New character posters of Angelina Jolie, Elle Fanning and others will leave you wanting for more

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Sep 04, 2019, 18:23 (IST)

After impressing the audience with a jaw-dropping trailer, the makers of 'Maleficent: Mistress of Evil' have taken to their social media handle to share new fascinating character posters to pique the audience's interest.
